Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "There's a lot I want to tell you about surviving out here on the snowfields, but today it'll have to wait...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm guessing you like surviving out here?", 3: '6', 4: 'Anything else we should be doing?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah. I like survival, since luck isn't as much of a factor. Card games, though, I like them for their gameplay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yeah, environmental surveying. This mission requires us to go conduct fieldwork.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Anyways, engineering wants us to set up our equipment on the designated coordinates.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's all this equipment?", 3: '10', 4: 'What else?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They're for surveying... I don't quite understand the technical details. They just need us to help set them up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They'll handle the rest remotely. We just need to help with installing them.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The equipment Rosetta brought resembles various tripods with a camera terminal on top. It appears to also have basic AI functionality.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Stretch it out and put it somewhere stable on the snow. Then the AI will latch this device to the ground.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The engineers want at least some data soon. So, we need to set everything up before sundown—Oh, huh...?', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the matter?", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's gone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The activation module... It's gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Looks like I lost it, but where could it have gone? Did I lose it on the plane... or on the way here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I equipment-checked with the engineering staff through a checklist. I highly doubt that we've forgotten to bring it over... We must've lost it on the way here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But that covers too wide of an area. We'll have to spend an hour or two just searching...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Better get started then...', 3: '24', 4: 'Can you have someone send another over?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah... You're right, Commandant. No choice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll have to write some reports for Babylonia... But this is the safest bet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I thought we could complete this mission without a hitch, but I guess today's not my lucky day...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Rosetta sighs. She picks up a pebble on the ground and tosses it into the ocean.'}
{3: 'The pebble skips on the water—once, twice... all the way up to seven times, before plunging into the sea.'}
{3: 'Rosetta notices your gaze and blushes before returning to her normal self.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Some Forest Guards do this to forget about bad things... I figured I'd give it a shot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Anyway, let's get moving...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Rotten figgins... Who's throwing rocks into the water?!"}
{3: 'Massive streams of bubbles fizzle near the shore, eventually breaking into a splash, revealing the silhouette of a massive, red-eyed figure.'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "So, you chucked that rock, aye?! Alright, have at it then, I'm gonna crush you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Yeti your bear butt! I'm a bear, jellyface! Bionic bear, aye?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Wait... Why would there be a bionic bear in the ocean?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Well, yeah? Cuz' I was swimming, aye?! What's the deal with you throwing rocks into the sea?! Summoning some watery tart for a golden rock?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'She was just blowing off steam.', 3: '48', 4: "It wasn't intentional.", 5: '48'}
{3: "Rosetta's simple and direct apology catches the bear off-guard. He visibly deflates, the rage nowhere to be seen. He asks you what it was all about."}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Ah, alright. So you lost some module thingamajig?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah, so I was just skipping rocks to take my mind off it. I didn't think it'd hit you. I'm sorry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Oh, um, well, 's alright, I'll let it slide. Can't blame no bear for gettin' mad when you get a rock to the head outta nowhere, though. Sorry 'bout that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'So yeah, anyhow. You trying to turn them three-legs on?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Think you can help?', 3: '60', 4: 'Have you seen our lost module?', 5: '61'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Ya, I can help, alright.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Nope. But I can help you get it set up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Just plug me right in, aye? I can turn 'em on. There's a control terminal on me back as well.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I never knew bionic bears could do this...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Yeah, yeah—bionics can do a lot more than you Constructs... What's that human's name?", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Tell the bear your name)', 3: '71', 4: "I'm a Construct, too.", 5: '72'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: '【kuroname】, aye? Alright, just do what I say.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "If you're the punchline, I give that a two outta ten... Just grab the cable and plug it to my back!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the help of the bear, you successfully activate the equipment, and Rosetta sighs in relief.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Hah, cake. Done and done.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Them folks' been talking about helping you humans out—figured I'd lend a paw. But don't go redistributin' sedimentary wealth into the sea again, Forest Guard!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll try my best not to.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "You'll TRY?!", 4: '1'}
